0,0,-1.description: You are underwater. Light glimmers from above.

1,0,-1.description: You are underwater. Light glimmers from above and you are standing on a large log.

-1,0,-1.description: You are underwater. Light glimmers from above and your foot taps a mossy bed below.

0,1,-1.description: You are underwater. Light glimmers from above and your foot taps a mossy bed below.

0,-1,-1.description: You are underwater. Light glimmers from above and your foot taps a mossy bed below.

0,0,-2.description: You are underwater, surrounded by large bolders and floating over a bed of moss. Light glimmers from above.

0,0,0.description: You are surfaced in the middle of the lake. There is mist and water surrounds you in all directions.

0,1,0.description: You are in a lake. There is mist and water surrounds you in all directions, but you can make out the shore in the distance.

0,2,0.description: You are knee deep in water. Through the mist, you can make out a forest to the north.

0,-1,0.description: You are in a lake. There is mist and water surrounds you in all directions, but you can make out the shore in the distance.

0,-2,0.description: You are knee deep in water. To the north, there is only more water. To the south there is a forest.

1,0,0.description: You are in a lake. There is mist and water surrounds you in all directions, but you can make out the shore in the distance.

1,1,0.description: You are knee deep in water and standing on a log. A mist surrounds you in all directions. You cannot see anything.

1,-1,0.description: You are knee deep in water and a mist surrounds you in all directions. You cannot see anything.

-1,0,0.description: You are in a lake. There is mist and water surrounds you in all directions, but you can make out the shore in the distance.

-1,1,0.description: You are knee deep in water. To the south and east, there is a lake covered by a mist; to the north and west there is a rocky shore and a forest.

-1,-1,0.description: You are knee deep in water. To the north and east, there is a lake covered by a mist; to the south and west there is a rocky shore and a forest.
